name: Storm Hit
description:
============ Game Description ===========

Background: You are placed in the desert and surrounded by many stranded people.
Storm is coming, in order to keep others in place, please find as many people as you can to fight against the storm with you. The more people you got, the more power you have to survive in the storm.

Goal: Collect people, and keep at least 30 people with you after the storm.

Instructions:

  • Move your player by WASD.
  • Attract as many followers BEFORE the storm.
  • Keep your followers close.
  • Don't lose them on the way and in the storm if they fall behind.
  • Make a wise choice to find the most suitable formation to survive.
  • Try to change formation if people are almost blown away by the storm.

And STAY STRONGER TOGETHER!

============ Development Background ===========

The game is done by a group of 3 people who have only basic knowledge on Unity.

Most of the arts are not created by ourselves but referenced online.

We have a tough schedule, so we only took our own time to finish the game apart from our job. We just made it and finished this little 2D game in around 3-4 man days.

It was fun to finally make a working game!

Have fun playing~
